alert.note: Alert for Ouachita (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 5:18PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ouachita Parish through 545 PM CDT... At 517 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Swartz to near Richwood to 13 miles northwest of Columbia. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Claiborne, West Monroe, Swartz, Brownsville-Bawcom, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Richwood, Fondale, Fairbanks, Bosco, Millhaven, Pine Grove and Luna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Louisiana.
